name: Haroldry: Reloaded
description:
Harold Returns!

After their epic adventure together in Haroldry, the HTML crew have settled into their new lives as innkeeps. But once again, an ancient foe emerges and must be squashed.

Typical playtime is around 10 minutes, longer if you hunt for all 8 endings.

Features:

- Autosave!

- Choices!

- 8 endings!

- A rare item!

- Theme 6!
